Function Documentation

void StatisticsToString (  RakNetStatisticsStruct *  s,
char *  buffer,
int  verbosityLevel
) 
 

Verbosity level currently supports 0 (low), 1 (medium), 2 (high)

Parameters:
s The Statistical information to format out
buffer The buffer containing a formated report
verbosityLevel 
  • 0 low
  • 1 medium
  • 2 high
